::Hot Rod::

He ran out of the base. He opened a comm to her.
"You mis understood me. I'm not going to fully reprogram you.
I just thought that if I removed that program you could make a honest
decision. As long as you have that program, you cant make this decision
base on what you truely want."
He hoped she would understand what he was saying, He only wanted to help
her.
